subject: [R] convergence of coxfilter and coxph
body:
Hi,
coxfilter function in genefilter package uses coxph to fit a model to filter genes. how come that coxfilter could converge to find a solution in cox model fitting using a data matrix of 8000 variables and 600 samples but coxph doesn't converge with the same matrix?

regards,
carol
